title: Got a Slack notification I shouldn't have received
body: I only have email notifications enabled but I got a Slack ping for a task assignment. I've never enabled Slack. Please check my account.

title: Wrong notification channels for some users
body: We're getting reports from multiple users that they receive notifications on channels they haven't opted into. It seems intermittent â€” not every notification is wrong. Restarting the service seems to fix it temporarily.
